title: Teen girl found with gunshot wound in Virginia Beach, police say
content:
A teenage girl was found with a gunshot wound in Virginia Beach, according to police.
The girl was taken to a local hospital, and she's expected to survive.
Around 5:51 p.m., police received a call about a gunshot wound in the 700 block of Hayes Ave. When officers arrived, they found a teenage girl between the ages of 15-17 with a gunshot wound.
An investigation is underway, police said. No suspect has been identified.
Anyone with information is asked to call the Crime Line at 1-888-LOCK-U-UP.
